title: Bravo Bank
details: It is a full functional Banking website. It is a Team Project with 3 team members. Completed within 3 weeks.
detail2: In this website a user request to open an account and when admin approve he would hold that account. After creating the account user can apply for a card and for a loan with some condition. If admin approve user can get the card and loan. User also can deposit money online on a condition
detail3: Technologies & Packages: Frontend: React TypesCript, React Router Dom, Tanstack Query, React Hook Form, EmailJS, Firebase Authentication, Express JS, MongoDB, Vercel etc.

title: LastBook
details: It is a second handed books selling website for students. There is a Dashboard to manage Admin routes, Seller routes.
detail2: In this website a successful payment method is added. I used React.js as a front-end technology and Tailwind CSS as a CSS framework. Used some React.js packages to faithfully finish the website.
detail3: For back-end I used Express.js. Implemented JWT token for a strong verification. Used MongoDB as a database. And added two sign-in method Email and Google sign-in.

title: EduShop
details: A student goods selling website where a user can get a product within a few costs. Especially focused on UI design.
detail2: Buyer can add a product to the wishlist or my order page. Google and facebook login implemented. Used CRUD operation to manage data with the database.
detail3: For front-end I used React.js and for back-end Express.js. Used MongoDB database. And added three sign-in method Email, Google and Facebook sign-in.

title: FoodMart

detail2: A seller can add a product easily with a few information. I used React.js as a front-end technology and Tailwind CSS as a CSS framework. Used some React.js packages to faithfully finish the website.
detail3: For back-end I used Express.js. Used MongoDB as a database. And added two sign-in method Email and Google sign-in.
